1.title: This Day Forward
1.plot: With only the gear they can fit into one bag, three couples are dropped in three of the most difficult environments on earth and try to survive the wild, and each other, for three weeks as they make their way back to civilization.

2.title: For Worse
2.plot: With only the clothes on their backs and the gear in their bag, Jenny and Justin struggle to find their first meal in a week, a raging forest fire forces Mitchell and Jhoanna to flee for their lives; and Max and Linn try to surpass their predecessors.

3.title: Thick and Thin
3.plot: Mitchell and Johanna struggle through a 16 mile journey to a new camp, only to get caught in a hail storm. Max and Linn battle starvation and each other in the unrelenting jungle. Jenny and Justin's plan to travel higher into the mountains turns ugly.

4.title: Transgression
4.plot: In Morocco, Mitchell and Jhoanna endure a massive hailstorm before hunting for their biggest food victory yet. Justin and Jenny finally emerge from a three-day storm in Norway. And in Mexico, Max and Linn experience a huge bounty - and a betrayal.

5.title: In Sickness
5.plot: In Morocco, Mitchell and Jhoanna embark on a trek through higher elevations only to have tempers flare. In Norway, Justin and Jenny try to outrun an Arctic storm. And in Mexico, Max and Linn's gamble to build a raft to float to civilization backfires.

6.title: Til Death
6.plot: In the final days of their challenge, survivalist couples struggle to reach civilization. Jhoanna and Mitchell go their separate ways. Justin and Jenny get flooded out of their final camp. And the medics must evaluate Max's declining health.

7.title: Unveiled
7.plot: Through new interviews and never-before seen footage our couples look back and reveal new insights about their three-week survival challenges in three of the most difficult locations in the world.

imdb.plot outline: Survivalist couples endure the ultimate test of their skills and relationships when, in the series premiere, they are dropped off in a harsh environment for a three-week period, during which they work together make their way back to civilization.
imdb.title: Men Women Wild
plot: Survivalist couples endure the ultimate test of their skills and relationships when, in the series premiere, they are dropped off in a harsh environment for a three-week period, during which they work together make their way back to civilization.::Gregory Bates

Survivalist couples endure the ultimate test of their skills and relationship when they are dropped off in a harsh environment for a three week period, during which they work together to make their way back to civilization. Each couple is dropped in various locations around the world, from a tropical jungle in Mexico, to a frozen mountain in Norway, and each couple is responsible for finding the raw materials fort building a fire and a shelter. Then they have to find some kind of food source, hopefully enough to sustain them for the three weeks they are out there, and then they have to travel from their drop point to their extraction point to go home. If at any time, one or both of the people can't handle the situation, they can tap out and be removed from the game.::J.P. Donnelly
